trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Representa o elemento <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> na criptografia XML.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This class is used to represent the `<EncryptedData>` element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada para representar o `<EncryptedData>` elemento na criptografia de XML.

trans-unit.source: This element is the core element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Este é o elemento principal na criptografia de XML.

trans-unit.source: Its child element, `<CipherData>`, contains encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: O elemento filho, `<CipherData>`, contém dados criptografados.

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptedData>` element replaces an encrypted element or serves as the new document root.
trans-unit.target: O `<EncryptedData>` elemento substitui um elemento criptografado ou serve como a raiz do documento novo.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criptografar e descriptografar um elemento XML usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example then displays various properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class to the console.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo exibe várias propriedades da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> classe para o console.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML encryption standards, see the "XML Encryption Syntax and Processing" document at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os padrões de criptografia de XML, consulte o documento "XML criptografia sintaxe e processamento de" em http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criptografar e descriptografar um elemento XML usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example then displays various properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class to the console.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo exibe várias propriedades da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> classe para o console.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação XML do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> that represents the <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> que representa o elemento <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> na criptografia XML.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to output the `<EncryptedData>` element.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para produzir o `<EncryptedData>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object representing an XML element to use for the <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> que representa um elemento XML a ser usado para o elemento <see langword="<EncryptedData>" />.

trans-unit.source: Loads XML information into the <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Carrega informações de XML no elemento <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> na criptografia XML.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to load an existing XML element into the `<EncryptedData>` element represented by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> object.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para carregar um elemento XML existente para o `<EncryptedData>` elemento representado pelo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criptografar e descriptografar um elemento XML usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example then displays various properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class to the console.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo exibe várias propriedades da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> classe para o console.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> provided is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="value" /> fornecido é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter does not contain a <<see langword="CypherData" />> node.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> não contém um nó <<see langword="CypherData" />>.
